451:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān sarvabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanirodhakramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ yena kramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nirodhasukhasamāpattimukhena na pratimuhyema,
451:6: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ||
451:7: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-ṣaṣṭhīṃ mahāmate bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśca nirodhaṃ samāpadyante |
451:8: saptamyāṃ bhūmau punaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyudāsātsamāpadyante,
451:10: teṣāṃ hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmābhisaṃskārikī grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇapatitā ca nirodhasamāpattiḥ |
451:11: ataste saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadyante-mā sarvadharmāṇāmaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprāptiḥ syāditi |
451:14: ataḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpattikauśalyaṃ nāsti yena samāpadyeran ||
451:15: aṣṭamyāṃ mahāmate bhūmau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvyāvṛttirbhavati |
451:16: prathamaṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau cittamanomanovijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati ātmātmīyavigataṃ svacittavikalpodbhavam,
451:18: dvidhā bālānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pariṇāmya svajñānaṃ na cāvabodhyante anādikāladauṣṭhulyavikalpaprapañcavāsanāvāsitāḥ ||
451:25: acintyabuddhamāhātmyaṃ ca deśayanti te buddhā bhagavantaḥ |
451:29: saptasu mahāmate bhūmiṣu cittamanomanovijñānalakṣaṇaparicayakauśalyātmātmīyagrāhyagrāhadharmapudgalanairātmyapravṛttinivṛttisvasāmānya-lakṣaṇaparicayacatuḥpratisaṃvidviniścayakauśalyavaśitāsvādasukhabhūmikramānupraveśabodhipākṣikadharmavibhāgaḥ kriyate mayā-mā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇānavabodhādbhūmikramānusaṃdhyakuśalāstīrthakarakudṛṣṭimārge prapateyuḥ,
451:31: na tu mahāmate atra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā anyatra svacitadṛśyamātramidaṃ yaduta bhūmikramānusaṃdhistraidhātukavicitropacāraśca |
451:33: anavabodhādbālānāṃ bhūmikramānusaṃdhivyapadeśaṃ traidhātukavicitropacāraśca vyavasthāpyate buddhadharmālayā ca ||
451:34: punaraparaṃ mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau nirodhasamāpattisukhamadamattāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāvaraṇavāsanāpudgaladharmanairātmyagrāhakadṛṣṭipatitā vikalpanirvāṇamatibuddhayo bhavanti,
451:36: bodhisattvāḥ punarmahāmate nirodhasamādhisukhamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvapraṇidhānakṛpākaruṇopetā niṣṭhapadagativibhāgajñā na parinirvānti |
451:43: tadyathā punarmahāmate kaścicchayitaḥ svapnāntare mahāvyāyāmautsukyena mahaughādātmānamuttārayet |
451:46: sa evaṃ samanupaśyet-nedaṃ satyaṃ na mithyā anyatra dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānubhūtavikalpavāsanāvicitrarūpasaṃsthānānādikālavikalpapatitā nāstyastidṛṣṭivikalpaparivarjitā manovijñānānubhūtāḥ svapne dṛśyante |
451:47: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā prathamasaptamībhūmisaṃcārātsarvadharmābhisamayānmāyādidharmasamatayā sarvadharmautsukyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpoparataṃ cittacaitasikavikalpaprasaraṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhadharmeṣu prayujyante |
451:48: anadhigatānāmadhigamāya prayoga eṣa mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na vināśaḥ cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvigamācca anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho bhavati |
451:49: na cātra mahāmate paramārthe kramo na kramānusaṃdhirnirābhāsavikalpaviviktadharmopadeśāt ||
451:53: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī |
451:54: dve hi bhūmī vihāro'tra śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā || 2 ||
451:61: daśamī tu bhavetprathamā prathamā cāṣṭamī bhavet |
451:62: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet || 6 ||
451:63: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet |
451:64: tṛtīyā ca bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ || 7 ||
